content.body: Why have you chosen not to include the :fullscreen CSS pseudo-class among other CSS pseudo-classes in this link https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/semantics-other.html#pseudo-classes, despite dedicating a page to the fullscreen API here https://fullscreen.spec.whatwg.org/?
chargeitall: it's defined in https://fullscreen.spec.whatwg.org/#:fullscreen-pseudo-class already, no need to define it twice
content.formatted_body: chargeitall: it's defined in https://fullscreen.spec.whatwg.org/#:fullscreen-pseudo-class already, no need to define it twice

content.body: Would you omit :checked from the html multipage if it had its own page?
